Stripping it all back

Lets learn from the pitfalls

  • Access features on a ‘need to know’ basis
  • A reactive interface providing suitable feedback
  • Allow the user to find and focus on an object of interest
  • Interaction reveals functional possibilities
  • Similar objects elicit consistent responses forming the learning cycle
  • Guidance without hinderance

A Voyage of Discovery
